processing:
**Functional Purpose**: Text indicating an ongoing process status
**UI Location**: Within the processing status summary component
**When Users See This**: When an item is actively being processed, tested, or analyzed
**Technical Context**: Part of a switch statement based on 'status' prop. This string must remain unchanged.
**Current English**: "Processing"
failed:
**Functional Purpose**: Text indicating a failed process status
**UI Location**: Within the processing status summary component
**When Users See This**: When an item's processing or tests have failed
**Technical Context**: Part of a switch statement based on 'status' prop. This string must remain unchanged.
**Current English**: "Failed"
passed:
**Functional Purpose**: Text indicating a successful process status
**UI Location**: Within the processing status summary component
**When Users See This**: When an item's processing or tests have passed successfully
**Technical Context**: Part of a switch statement based on 'status' prop. This string must remain unchanged.
**Current English**: "Passed"
processingStatus:
**Functional Purpose**: Accessible label for the processing status summary component
**UI Location**: Applied as an `aria-label` to the main container of the processing status summary
**When Users See This**: Screen reader users will hear this label when interacting with the processing status indicator
**Technical Context**: This string is used for an `aria-label` attribute. This string must remain unchanged.
**Current English**: "Processing status"
